industryGrowth.title: Mutual fund
industryGrowth.description: The Indian Mutual Fund Industry AUM has grown from Rs 1 Lakh crore in May 2004 to Rs 75.36 lakh Cr in July 2025 translating into a growth of more than 75 times in last 2 decades.

offerings.title: Offerings
offerings.description: Our commitment to excellence, cutting-edge technology, and personalized support ensures that you have a reliable ally in navigating the complexities of the financial world.

steps.title: Steps To Become A
steps.subtitle: Boost your revenue by offering diverse financial instruments

items.title: Take online NISM V-A Training
items.content: Complete the NISM V-A training program online at your convenience.

items.title: Pass NISM Exam
items.content: NISM exams are conducted across multiple cities and towns in India. Candidate can choose their preferred venue, date and time slot. NISM charges a fees of Rs 3000+GST for booking the seat. This is a 2-hr exam with 100 Multiple Choice Questions. Candidates need to attain 50% marks. There is no negative marking. Finomatic team helps you in booking examination slot.

items.title: Obtain ARN Number
items.content: After passing the exam, obtain your ARN (AMFI Registration Number) to start your distribution business.

items.title: Partner with Finyzer Assets
items.content: Complete the registration process with Finyzer Assets and get access to our platform and support systems.

hero.title: Become
hero.subtitle: Build a scalable income with India's fastest growing investment industry

hero.footerText: 21+ years of experience, a strong presence in Jharkhand, and 200+ families guided through SIPs, Mutual Funds, and portfolio planning.
